title: Steve and Marjorie Anniversary, Jimmy Kimmel, Dr. Bernice King, Bill Cosby and more.
itunes:title: Steve and Marjorie Anniversary, Jimmy Kimmel, Dr. Bernice King, Bill Cosby and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is here for you as a drunkard Englishman. He has a message for his hillbilly brethren. The Chief Love Officer helps a lady deal with the end of the honeymoon phase. Jimmy Kimmel apologizes for his past. The FBI has determined that the noose found in Bubba Wallace's garage stall had been there since 2019. Dr. Bernice King spoke at Rayshard Brooks' funeral. The Pennsylvania Supreme Court has accepted Bill Cosby's appeal. There is regular talk and then there is COVID-19 talk. Steve tells us about his present situation at home. Happy Anniversary to Steve and Marjorie as they celebrate 14 years of marriage. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about marriage and breaks down percentages, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
